FSRRedesignFareDescription: All fares shown are the total price roundtrip, per person.|All fares shown are the total price, per person.|Fares are for the entire one-way trip, per person.
DOTOnTimeMessagesBrazilFsrRedesign: <br/><br/>*The cancellation percentage is calculated according to the total segments scheduled.<br/><br/><strong>Delayed:</strong> The delay percentage is determined by the scheduled arrival at the destination of each flight and calculated according to the total segments flown, disregarding canceled flights.<br/><br/>The delay and cancellation percentages represent past flights and therefore may change each month. The flight history for all regular public air transportation in Brazil is available on the National Civil Avaiation Agency's website.
DOTOnTimeMessagesFsrRedesign: <strong>On-time:</strong> Percentage of arrivals within 15 minutes of scheduled arrival time<br/><br/><strong>Late:</strong> Percentage of arrivals more than 30 minutes late<br/><br/><strong>Canceled:</strong> Percentage canceled (shown if 5% or more of the flight's operations were canceled in the reporting period)

DOTOnTimeNotAvailableMessage: There is no recent record of delay and cancellation percentage for this flight.
